answers.answer: How far along are u? R u taking vitamins
You need to get your cbg down. That's what will make you feel better.  Do you take meds for the diabetes? You may want to check in with your doc.

Without the aid of medicine,  I don't think there is much you can do naturally to get your sugar down. And high numbers are scary. If it doesn't go down soo , I would go to the ER. With as tired as u were and no energy,  it sounds like ur sugar was even higher than that.
No I don't take diabetes meds I go back to the doctor Monday if it's still high then they go put me on insulin or pills :( I don't like nor of them

question: My husband had to wake me up bout 6:30pm still was feeling tired and just wanted to lay around took my sugar and it's high 249 and all I want to do is sleep I don't have no energy in my body what to do besides drink water?
title: been sleeping since 4pm
